alert.note: Alert for Clay; Fentress; Overton; Pickett (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 2:27AM CDT until July 21 at 3:30AM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Overton County in Middle Tennessee... Pickett County in Middle Tennessee... Clay County in Middle Tennessee... Fentress County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 330 AM CDT. * At 226 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles northeast of Jamestown to near Celina, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Livingston, Jamestown, Celina, Byrdstown, Allardt, Grimsley, Moss, Rickman, Pall Mall, Wolf River Dock, Crawford, Dale Hollow Lake, Pickett State Park, Standing Stone State Park and Ashlock. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
